songs.title: Blowing In The Wind*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics will be available upon release. Stay tuned!

[Verse 1]

[Chorus]
So take a look around and, you can settle down no
[?] blowing in the wind
So take a look around and, you can settle down no
[?] blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind

[Verse 2]
We can figure out tomorrow
So you've be wasting your time
It ain't fixing your sorrow
Did you say [?] your light
How do our lives become lighter ?
How do our eyes become brighter ?
You gotta believe in something higher
I never thought of forgiveness
Why do we really want to gain ?
Why won't we learn to be selfless ?
Wake away from all the shame

[Chorus]
So take a look around and, you can settle down no
[?] blowing in the wind
So take a look around and, you can settle down no
[?] blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind
Blowing in the wind
